name: 2022 European Conference on Networks and Communications & 6G Summit
content: 2022 EuCNC & 6G Summit focuses on various aspects of 5G and 6G communications systems and networks, including cloud and virtualisation solutions, management technologies, hardware components and microelectronic technologies, and vertical application areas. The conference targets to bring together researchers from all over the world to present the latest research results, and it is one of the main venues for demonstrating the results of research projects, especially from successive European RDI programmes.
organizers: CEA-Leti, European Commission, IEEE ComSoc, 6G Flagship
